title: PageExtractionTemplate
description: Structured payload describing parsed data for a single PDF page.

items.description: All spending lines that were fully captured on the current page in top-to-bottom order.

code.description: Short code that uniquely identifies the spending voice, if present in the source document.

description.description: Full textual description for the line item. Prefer the most verbose text available.

quantity.description: Quantity or unit of measure exactly as reported, preserving any unit abbreviations.

unit_price.description: Price per unit of measure. Use a floating point number with a dot decimal separator.

total_price.description: Extended price for the full line item. Use a floating point number with a dot decimal separator.

continuation.description: Information about the item that was cut off by the page break so the extractor can stitch the next page correctly.

pending_code.description: Code of the item that continues on the next page, if available.

pending_description.description: Description text that was truncated by the page break. Include as much text as the current page reveals.
